data.title: Apple iPad Air (4th Gen) - Support Overview
data.meta_description: Find all iPad Air (4th Gen) Support information here. Learn how to activate, set up features and troubleshoot issues with our FAQs, how-to guides and videos.
data.text:
Apps & Widgets

Top Ten Support Requests & Resources - IBM MaaS360

Here are the top ten support requests & resources for the MaaS360.

Apps & Widgets

Add Users on Core - MobileIron

Here's info on how to add users on Core for your MobileIron service.

Apps & Widgets

Allow / Require / Forbid Apps on Devices - MobileIron

Here's info on how to allow / require / forbid apps on your MobileIron devices.

Apps & Widgets

App Updates - Apple

Here's how to check for app updates on your iPhone or iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple Article - iPhone, iPad, or iPod not recognized in iTunes for Windows

If your iOS device won't connect to iTunes on your PC, view this info.

How to Use

Apple Devices - Resolve Windows Device Manager Conflicts

Here's how to resolve driver conflicts if your Apple device doesn't properly interface with your computer.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Record a Time Lapse Video

Here's how to record a time lapse video on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Reprovision Cellular Data Account

Here's how to reprovision your iPad's cellular data account if you are having connectivity or billing issues.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Save Pictures from Browser

Here's how to save images via the web browser on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Spotlight Search

Here's how to quickly search for contacts, email and other content on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - View / Extend Battery Life

Here's how to see charging status, battery life and which apps or processes use your iPad's battery.

How to Use

Apple iPad - iPadOS Software Updates

Learn about the latest iPadOS updates for all iPads, including performance improvements, enhancements and major operating system updates.

Troubleshooting

Apple iPad Air (4th Gen.) Troubleshooting Assistant

This online tool will help you identify and resolve problems with your Apple® iPad Air® (4th Gen.).

Apps & Widgets

Assign User and Admin Roles - MobileIron

Here's how to set allowed functions for users and administrators in MobileIron.

How to Use

Call Waiting - Apple iOS

Here's how to answer call on your iPhone while you're on another call.

How to Use

Change or Add Data Bundles - Prepaid iPad

Here's how to add or change a data bundle for prepaid service on an iPad.

Troubleshooting

Check for Physical Damage - Charging Ports

Here's how to help determine if your device has a damaged charging port.

Troubleshooting

Check for Physical Damage - Screen

Here's how to help determine if your device has screen damage.

Troubleshooting

Check for Physical Damage - Separated Hinges

Here's how to help determine if your device has physical damage to the hinge.

Troubleshooting

Check for Water Damage

Here's how to help determine if your device has liquid damage.

How to Use

Configure the Email Client to Leave Messages on Server after Retrieval

View this info on leaving email messages on the server after retrieval.

How to Use

Configure the Email Client to Leave Messages on Server after Retrieval - Macintosh

Here's how to leave a copy of messages on the server after you retrieve them.

How to Use

Content Transfer Center

Find the best way to transfer your pictures, videos, contacts and other content from one device to another. See step-by-step instructions for devices by operating system.

Troubleshooting

Damaged Device Fee FAQs

Learn about the Damaged Device Fee that's charged if you turn in your device for a Certified Like-New Replacement and your returned device has been misused.

How to Use

Delete Temporary Internet Files and Cookies - Safari

Here's how to clear temporary internet files and cookies for the Safari web browser on your Macintosh computer.

How to Use

Deregister iMessage - Cannot Send/Receive SMS/MMS On a Non-Apple Device

Here's info to help If you're unable to send or receive SMS / MMS messages on a Non-Apple device.

How to Use

Disable Work Offline - Internet Browser

Here's how to check if you're offline if you can't connect to the internet via a computer with Internet Explorer, Chrome, or Firefox.

Download and Install App - MobileIron

Here's how to install the MobileIron app on your Android, iOS or Windows device.

How to Use

Export Contacts as a Comma Separated Values (*.csv) File - Yahoo! Mail

Here's how to export your contacts to a CSV file using Yahoo Mail.

Apps & Widgets

Field Force Manager FAQs

Learn about Field Force Manager, a service that helps you monitor and communicate with your workers in the field.

Apps & Widgets

Follow Customer's Cases - MobileIron

Here's how to look up and follow a customer's support cases in MobileIron.

Here's some info that about garbled messages and ways to avoid them.

Here's info on improving GPS performance on your device.

Here's info on how to view the LDAP Sync History Error for your MobileIron service.

If you want to change your Facebook privacy or security, here's how to access those options.

Manually Quarantine a Device - MobileIron

Here's how to manually quarantine a device via the MobileIron support site.

Here's how to manage services (e.g., Verizon Cloud, Device Protection, etc.) via the My Verizon app.

If you're having issues with your non-removable battery charging or not holding a charge, view this info.

In this guide, we'll show you how to troubleshoot and resolve common Verizon SIM card issues. Additional online technical support and help is available.

Here's how to sign in to or out of iTunes on a Mac or Windows computer.

Transfer Content with Samsung Smart Switch Mobile App

Turn Voice Input On / Off - Apple

You can use voice input on your iPhone or iPad to type hands-free instead of using your keyboard.

Features

Turn VoiceOver On / Off - Apple

Here's how to turn VoiceOver for your iPhone / iPad on or off.

Verizon Messages (Message+) - Apple iPad - Manage Text Message Notification Settings

Here's how to manage text message notification settings via the Verizon Messages (Message+) app on your iPad.

Verizon Messages (Message+) - Apple iPad - Manage Text Message Signature Settings

Here's how to enter or edit your Verizon Messages (Message+) signature from your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Verizon Messages (Message+) - Apple iPad - Send / Re-send an eGift

Troubleshooting

Video: Factors that impact your wireless signal

(length: 3:13)

Having issues with your wireless signal? Learn about the factors that impact it and the solutions to fix it.

Length: 3:13

How to Use

Video: Finding your device ID

(length: 2:09)

There are a few different ways to find your Device ID. Watch this video to see the best way to get that information.

Length: 2:09

Troubleshooting

Video: Troubleshooting a Wi-Fi Connection

(length: 2:55)

Having issues with your Wi-Fi connection? Have no fear! Follow these simple steps to get your Wi-Fi connection up and running.

Length: 2:55

How to Use

Video: Verizon Messages - Basic Use

(length: 1:24)

Learn about the basic use of Verizon Messages, a text messaging app that lets you easily send and receive messages, attach photos to texts or group message.

Length: 1:24

How to Use

Video: Verizon Messages - Getting Creative

(length: 1:31)

Add a personal touch to your messages with some of the easy tools in Verizon Messages. Customize pictures, and even send an eGift from one of over 30 merchants.

Length: 1:31

How to Use

Video: Verizon Messages - On the Move

(length: 2:05)

With Verizon Messages, schedule a message to be sent at a later time or date and use driving mode to stay safe while you're on the road.

Length: 2:05
